name.baseName: Rare Earth cleaning;Rare Earth;Molten Salt Electrolysis;NdFeB Magnet Scrap
稀土清洗;稀土;熔盐电解;钕铁硼磁铁废料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described process is a laboratory-scale development for recycling rare earth metals, specifically neodymium (Nd) and praseodymium (Pr), from NdFeB magnet scrap. The extraction method recovers Nd and Pr for the production of Nd-Pr alloy, which is used in the manufacture of new magnets, typically applied in various high-tech applications such as wind turbines, electric motors, and other devices requiring strong permanent magnets.
该过程是一个实验室规模的开发，旨在从NdFeB磁铁废料中回收稀土金属，特别是钕(Nd)和镨(Pr)。提取方法回收Nd和Pr，用于生产Nd-Pr合金，该合金通常应用于新磁铁的制造，这些磁铁通常应用于风力涡轮机、电动机和其他需要强磁铁的高科技设备。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit of this analysis was chosen as the production of one kg Nd–Pr alloy through extraction from NdFeB magnet scrap

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The one-step recycling process to extract rare earth metals from scrap magnets is being developed on a laboratory scale at TU Delft. Nonmagnetized, uncoated magnet samples were used in the experiment. The magnets were ball milled under inert atmosphere to increase the surface area to facilitate the electrochemical reactions, and the powder was inserted into the salt bath.
代尔夫特理工大学正在实验室规模上开发一种从废磁铁中提取稀土金属的一步回收工艺。实验中使用未磁化、未涂层的磁体样品。将磁体在惰性气氛下球磨以增加表面积以促进电化学反应，并将粉末插入盐浴中。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process is a laboratory-scale development for recycling rare earth metals, specifically neodymium (Nd) and praseodymium (Pr), from NdFeB magnet scrap. The extraction method recovers Nd and Pr for the production of Nd-Pr alloy, which is used in the manufacture of new magnets, typically applied in various high-tech applications such as wind turbines, electric motors, and other devices requiring strong permanent magnets.
该过程是一个实验室规模的开发，旨在从NdFeB磁铁废料中回收稀土金属，特别是钕(Nd)和镨(Pr)。提取方法回收Nd和Pr，用于生产Nd-Pr合金，该合金通常应用于新磁铁的制造，这些磁铁通常应用于风力涡轮机、电动机和其他需要强磁铁的高科技设备。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The allocation of environmental flows to Nd and Pr was updated. Value allocation was used to share the process impacts from both multi-output stages, reflecting prices from recent years (2013–2016). There are two stages in the primary production of rare earths for which assumptions regarding coproductions are necessary: the beneficiation stage, where concentrated iron ore and rare earth concentrate are separated, and the solvent extraction stage undertaken to separate individual rare earths.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Schulze, R., Abbasalizadeh, A., Bulach, W., Schebek, L. & Buchert, M. An Ex-ante LCA Study of Rare Earth Extraction from NdFeB Magnet Scrap Using Molten Salt Electrolysis. J. Sustain. Metall. 4, 493–505 (2018).

Schulze, R., Abbasalizadeh, A., Bulach, W., Schebek, L. & Buchert, M. An Ex-ante LCA Study of Rare Earth Extraction from NdFeB Magnet Scrap Using Molten Salt Electrolysis. J. Sustain. Metall. 4, 493–505 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) purposes, it is important to note that the data reflects a one-step recycling process developed in a laboratory setting, which may not be directly scalable or applicable to industrial processes without modification. The environmental impacts have been allocated to Nd and Pr based on value allocation, considering prices between 2013–2016. Users should exercise caution when extrapolating this data to different temporal contexts or market conditions. Methodological considerations such as coproduction assumptions in the beneficiation and solvent extraction stages should be reviewed and adjusted according to the specifics of the analyzed system.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，重要的是要注意数据反映了在实验室设置中开发的一步回收过程，可能无法直接扩大规模或适用于工业过程而无需修改。环境影响已根据2013-2016年间的价格进行了价值分配，分配给Nd和Pr。用户在将此数据外推到不同的时间背景或市场条件时应谨慎行事。像选矿和溶剂萃取阶段的共生产假设这样的方法论考虑应根据分析系统的具体情况进行审查和调整。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Pre-treatment steps: The kg CO2 emissions per kg magnet (GWP 100a) cleaned from SiC roughly correspond to its contribution in the MoRe project.
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil
Pre-treatment steps: Cleaning of magnet with silicon carbide
Pre-treatment steps: Cleaning of magnet with silicon carbide
